title: 1911 T206 Cycle 460 Bender no trees SGC 40 (MOVED TO EBAY)
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: 1911 T206 Cycle 460 Bender no trees SGC 40 (MOVED TO EBAY)
posts.post_content:
Hi all,
I snagged this one last week for a good price, but don't need it.  I would consider trading for a graded VG Old Mill Shag to add to the backs line, or a bunch of beater SLers, HOFers or commons to add to the beater hoard of raw goodies.  I wouls also love to trade for a beater T204 Eddie Collins or an American Beauty Eddie Collins.

Johnny already has this one, so worries about stepping on his toes!!

You can also buy it for $MOVED TO EBAY delivered.  Paypal gift is preferred.  A commitment to buy comes first, unless a trade has been agreed upon by both parties.  Sorry for the bad scans, but that is the best I can do with SGC slabs.

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url] 

Also, this is not the best looking SGC 40 around.  It is dirty, and looks to have two tiny spots of paper loss on the back.

Thanks for looking out Bobby!  Nice card,good luck with the sale
